title: Ep 150: It's Freakin' Sally Hershberger!
itunes:title: Ep 150: It's Freakin' Sally Hershberger!
itunes:subtitle: Iconic hair stylist Sally Hershberger kicks back in the studio to talk about the Birth of the Shag, the state of the salon business, working with Annie Leibovitz and Herb Ritts, and hanging with Cher, Joan Jett, Meg Ryan, and, well, everyone (...
description:
Iconic hair stylist Sally Hershberger kicks back in the studio to talk about the Birth of the Shag, the state of the salon business, working with Annie Leibovitz and Herb Ritts, and hanging with Cher, Joan Jett, Meg Ryan, and, well, everyone (!). Before that: The new "Glass Makeup" trend; "mewing" to sculpt your jawline; and Wands for Wildlife.


Want more Fat Mascara?

Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand

Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jennedit 

Twitter: @fatmascara
